posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dennis
I need about ten more to complete a set, and quite a few upgrades...

Please email me if you have any available..

Many thanks,

Dennis

Posted By: Jeff Schwarz
Dennis, which 10 do you need?  I need the Walsh (Browns) with the red basepaths to finish.  Would love to help!

Posted By: Dennis
Thanks Jeff! 

I recently traded a Walsh red (sorry)- I'll keep a lookout for another for you...

Actually - I need 14 more for the master set (not counting red infields - and, I'm not quite sure if the yellow Chance exists):

Tommy Griffith - brown infield 
Ray Chapman - yellow pennants
Jack Graney - purple pennants
Jack Graney - yellow pennants
Steve O'Neil - red pennants
Terry Turner - yellow pennants
Paddy Bauman - brown infield
Del Baker - brown infield
Frank Chance - yellow pennants
Ham Hyatt - purple pennants 
Bill Doak - purple pennants
Hank Robinson - yellow pennants
Bill Steele - yellow pennants
Danny Moeller - brown pennants

Thanks again - any help would be appreciated.
